document_data.name: Bexendral
document_data.mainbody: '''Bexendral''' was a [[gold dragon]] and a prince of [[Dawnfire]] during the [[Dawn Age]] around {{Yearlink|-25000}}.
document_data.Abilities:
The prince was known to cast at least one [[spell]] that hurled a shower of sparks, which then ignited and exploded. He was also capable of casting at least one spell that teleported it, most likely ''[[teleportation]]''.

Bexendral was able to hover in place with some difficulty on his own power.{{cite book/Realms of the Elves/Traitors|63}}
document_data.Activities: Bexendral was known to make a study of [[magic]].{{cite book/Realms of the Elves/Traitors|42}}
document_data.Relationships: He was the heir of [[Orchtrien]], the king of Dawnfire.
document_data.History: Around {{Yearlink|-25090}}, Bexendral aided the forces of [[Rhespen Ash]], an [[elven]] commander under his reign, after they were ambushed by rebels, saving their lives.{{cite book/Realms of the Elves/Traitors|26}} triggering  their later schemes.{{cite book/Realms of the Elves/Traitors|52}}
